writingDetail.html:
1

A Dilophosaurus made out of clay 由粘土制成的双齿龙

2

In rural areas of China, children ride bicycles in the yards of villages. Green grasslands and white-walled houses sit beneath a blue sky, in a simple, flat illustration style reminiscent of children's art. The high-definition image quality captures this idyllic scene.

在中国农村地区，孩子们在村庄的院子里骑自行车。绿色的草原和白色的围墙房屋坐落在蓝天下，以简单、平坦的插图风格让人联想到儿童艺术。高清图像质量捕捉到了这一田园诗般的场景。

3

A majestic horse with a flowing mane, watercolor splashes of vibrant colors, and delicate brush strokes capture the essence of speed in an enchanting composition. The white background highlights the subject.

一匹雄壮的马，鬃毛飘逸，水彩泼洒着鲜艳的色彩，精致的笔触在迷人的构图中捕捉到了速度的精髓。白色背景突出了主题。

4

Double exposure style; close-up of a tall, slender woman with extremely long, flowing hair, standing gracefully. Her silhouette merges with a vast cosmic scene inside, filled with vibrant planets, stars, galaxies, and an intricate zodiac wheel, symbolizing astrology. The cosmos within her form radiates depth and cosmic beauty, with zodiac symbols orbiting around a glowing astrological circle at her core. The background is deep space, filled with subtle celestial elements that blend seamlessly into the scene. The image captures an ethereal, mystical quality with brilliant contrast between the elegant woman and the vast, abstract universe within. ultra-realistic and cinematic.

双重曝光方式；一位身材高挑、头发飘逸的女人优雅地站着的特写镜头。她的轮廓与内部广阔的宇宙场景融为一体，充满了充满活力的行星、恒星、星系和复杂的黄道带，象征着占星术。她体内的宇宙散发着深度和宇宙之美，黄道带符号围绕着她核心的一个发光的占星圈旋转。背景是深空，充满了微妙的天体元素，与场景无缝融合。这张照片捕捉到了一种空灵、神秘的品质，优雅的女人和广阔、抽象的宇宙之间形成了鲜明的对比。超现实主义和电影化。

5

female kitsune mask katana

女性kitsune面具katana

6

A group of origami birds in white, with one red bird standing out as the leader. The background is plain and neutral to highlight them against it. This symbolizes magnificent professional photography in the style of White Background.

一群白色的折纸鸟，其中一只红色的鸟脱颖而出。背景是朴素而中性的，以突出它们。这象征着白色背景风格的壮丽专业摄影。

7

a chritsmas ornaments, and decorations with a vintage orange wall as background, use cozy lights

圣诞装饰品和以复古橙色墙壁为背景的装饰品使用舒适的灯光

8

An unmanned warfare vessel inspired by the Bacarados, featuring laser weapons, minimalist abstract design, product image, Nikon, 8K, 3D,

一艘受巴卡拉多斯启发的无人战舰，以激光武器、极简抽象设计、产品图像、尼康、8K、3D为特色，

9

Hyper-realistic painting of a young white skinny 19-year-old girl standing on a beach with a new white big surfboard. Her sun-kissed flowing thick blonde hair big cascading falling down, radiant big blue eyes. She is dressed in a stylish bright high-tech short wetsuit with shorts. Her bright smile reflects the thrill of the moment, capturing a sense of freedom and joy. The full-body shot captures her entire figure. Professional detailing of the big surfboard. The background is a beautiful high vivid blue sea waves and well-groomed beach with beautiful green palm trees, Europe and the United States Sports Girl, European and American white girl model, European and American white model Face, Point of view is directly from the front, perfect pose, fine detail. Ultra-high perfect detailed, ultra-realistic textures, professional cinematic lighting, local soft lighting of girl, fine detail, Professional glossing shot, ultra details background, high quality detail of shot, Saturated Colors, Vivid Color.

一幅超现实主义的画作，描绘了一个19岁的白人瘦女孩站在海滩上，手里拿着一块新的白色大冲浪板。阳光亲吻着她飘逸的浓密金发，大瀑布般垂下，一双湛蓝的大眼睛闪闪发光。她穿着一件时尚明亮的高科技短潜水服和短裤。她灿烂的笑容反映了那一刻的激动，捕捉到了一种自由和快乐的感觉。全身照片捕捉到了她的整个身材。大冲浪板的专业细节。背景是一个美丽的高生动的蓝色海浪和整洁的海滩，有美丽的绿色棕榈树、欧美运动女孩、欧美白人模特、欧美白人名模的脸，从正面看，姿势完美，细节精细。超高完美细节、超逼真纹理、专业电影照明、女孩局部柔和照明、精细细节、专业光泽镜头、超细节背景、高质量镜头细节、饱和色彩、鲜艳色彩。

10

Chris Ryniak style image with text "good morning"

Chris Ryniak风格的图片，文字为“早上好”

11

Create a hyper-realistic image of a Jaeger designed to resemble an ancient Egyptian Pharaoh, complete with a magnificent golden headdress and ornate armor. The Jaeger wields a pair of intricately designed spears and carries a decorated shield that reflects the grandeur of ancient Egypt. Next to the Jaeger, a small human figure stands in awe, highlighting the immense size of the Jaeger. The background features the iconic pyramids of Giza, bathed in the warm glow of a setting sun, enhancing the majestic atmosphere of the scene. The overall composition should evoke a sense of history and power, blending futuristic elements with ancient Egyptian motifs.

创造一个超现实的耶格尔形象，其设计类似于古埃及法老，配有华丽的金色头饰和华丽的盔甲。耶格尔挥舞着一对设计精美的长矛，手持一个装饰精美的盾牌，反映了古埃及的宏伟。在耶格尔旁边，一个身材矮小的人敬畏地站着，突显了耶格尔的巨大体型。背景以吉萨的标志性金字塔为特色，沐浴在夕阳的温暖光辉中，增强了场景的雄伟氛围。整体构图应唤起一种历史感和力量感，将未来主义元素与古埃及图案融为一体。

12

Real hair texture, a cute, round, chubby cartoon cat, fluffy and plump, gray and white fur, small ears, calm expression, 3D rendering, soft lighting, minimalist background.

真实的头发纹理，一只可爱、圆润、胖乎乎的卡通猫，毛茸茸的，灰白色的皮毛，小耳朵，平静的表情，3D渲染，柔和的灯光，极简主义的背景。

13

A striking dilophosaurus, its body composed of vibrant, neon-colored origami paper, embodying a fusion of pop art and surrealism. This artwork emphasizes bold textures and dynamic patterns, creating a visually captivating piece suitable for a high-quality poster that showcases masterful craftsmanship, high resolution, 8k image.

一只引人注目的双龙，它的身体由充满活力的霓虹色折纸组成，体现了波普艺术和超现实主义的融合。这件艺术品强调大胆的纹理和动态图案，创造了一件视觉上迷人的作品，适合展示精湛工艺、高分辨率、8k图像的高质量海报。

14

Black cat with yellow eyes, covered in snowflakes, captured in the style of Leica M6 camera, portrait photography style, natural lighting, f/2.8 lens focus, fine details, soft shadows, low-contrast background.

黑猫黄眼睛，雪花覆盖，采用徕卡M6相机风格拍摄，肖像摄影风格，自然光照，f/2.8镜头对焦，细节细腻，阴影柔和，背景对比度低。

15

photorealistic paintng, metal parts, plates, jumping metallic whale on desert, abstract painting with photorealstic pattern, square sections and basrelief, vertical leaking paint lines, masterfull oil painting by paul gauguin, style of odd nerdrum, syle of jeremy mann, impressionim

写实主义绘画、金属零件、板材、沙漠上跳跃的金属鲸鱼、具有写实主义图案的抽象绘画、方形截面和浮雕、垂直泄漏的绘画线条、保罗·高更的大师油画、奇书呆子风格、杰瑞米·曼的塞勒、印象主义

16

create an immage similar to Van Gogh with sheep and woman with umbrella

用羊和带伞的女人创造一个类似梵高的肖像

17

Ink style, a beautiful girl, holding a sword in her hand, exaggerated movements, dancing the sword in her hand, the picture is very tense and contrasting.

水墨风格，一个美丽的女孩，手里拿着剑，夸张的动作，手里舞剑，画面非常紧张和对比。

18

Peach and honey dripping, minimalist aesthetic, pink background, hyperrealistic photography.

桃和蜜糖滴，极简主义美学，粉红色背景，超现实主义摄影。

19

Graphics composed of thin straight lines on the latest Japanese automobiles, dense design, high definition, white background

最新日本汽车上由细直线组成的图形，密集的设计，高清晰度，白色背景

20

Screengrab from the live-action movie of The Star's Art, a full-body shot of an armored paladin in black and gold armor holding his sword out to attack, with a silver glowing light emitting from his hand and a glowing white aura surrounding him. The shot is taken from a low angle, with a cinematic feel, a dark background, and sun rays shining through the windows, creating an atmospheric and dramatic dark fantasy scene.

《星之艺术》真人电影的截屏，一个身穿黑色和金色盔甲的装甲圣骑士举着剑进攻的全身镜头，他的手发出银色的光芒，周围环绕着白色的光环。这张照片是从低角度拍摄的，有一种电影般的感觉，黑暗的背景，阳光透过窗户照射进来，营造出一种大气而戏剧性的黑暗幻想场景。
writingDetail.title: 精选Prompts：双齿龙、村庄、奔马、飘逸女、面具、折纸鸟、圣诞装饰、无人战舰、海滩等
